meanings.sent1: The intercrystalline structure of the rock made it strong and durable.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the intercrystalline spaces in the mineral sample.
meanings.sent3: The intercrystalline pattern in the gemstone looked like a hidden message.
meanings.sent4: The intercrystalline bond between the crystals was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The intercrystalline arrangement of the molecules created a beautiful pattern.

meanings.definition: Relating to the spaces between crystals.
meanings.sent1: The intercrystalline gaps in the structure allowed for flexibility.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler examined the intercrystalline structure of the diamond.
meanings.sent3: The intercrystalline gaps in the ice formed a unique design.
meanings.sent4: The intercrystalline spaces resembled tiny tunnels between the crystals.
meanings.sent5: The intercrystalline layout of the atoms determined the mineral's properties.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the boundaries between crystals.
meanings.sent1: The intercrystalline boundaries in the metal affected its strength.
meanings.sent2: The geologist analyzed the intercrystalline regions in the rock sample.
meanings.sent3: The intercrystalline edges of the crystal sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The intercrystalline borders defined the shape of the mineral.
meanings.sent5: The intercrystalline boundaries acted as barriers between the crystals.
